languages.text: "Я бы мог навешать вам на уши красивых словес о том, как перебирал в памяти Инъюнкта Кардинал или молился Императору, но... Я правда молился, и я хорошо подготовлен, чтобы терпеть боль, однако и у арбитра есть предел. Когда я почти сломался, мне помогла ненависть".

"I could throw pretty words at you about how I went through the Injuncta Cardinal in my mind or prayed to the Emperor, but... I did pray, and I was well trained to tolerate pain, but every Arbitrator has their limit. When I was almost broken, what helped me through was hatred."
languages.original_text: "Я бы мог навешать вам на уши красивых словес о том, как перебирал в памяти Инъюнкта Кардинал или молился Императору, но... Я правда молился, и я хорошо подготовлен, чтобы терпеть боль, однако и у арбитра есть предел. Когда я почти сломался, мне помогла ненависть".

"I could throw pretty words at you about how I went through the Injuncta Cardinal in my mind or prayed to the Emperor, but... I did pray, and I was well trained to tolerate pain, but every Arbitrator has their limit. When I was almost broken, what helped me through was hatred."

"I could throw pretty words at you about how I went through the Injuncta Cardinal in my mind or prayed to the Emperor, but... I did pray, and I was well trained to tolerate pain, but every Arbitrator has their limit. When I was almost broken, what helped me through was hatred."

"I could throw pretty words at you about how I went through the Injuncta Cardinal in my mind or prayed to the Emperor, but... I did pray, and I was well trained to tolerate pain, but every Arbitrator has their limit. When I was almost broken, what helped me through was hatred."

"I could throw pretty words at you about how I went through the Injuncta Cardinal in my mind or prayed to the Emperor, but... I did pray, and I was well trained to tolerate pain, but every Arbitrator has their limit. When I was almost broken, what helped me through was hatred."

"I could throw pretty words at you about how I went through the Injuncta Cardinal in my mind or prayed to the Emperor, but... I did pray, and I was well trained to tolerate pain, but every Arbitrator has their limit. When I was almost broken, what helped me through was hatred."

languages.text: 「頭の中でインユンクタ・カーディナルを唱えたとか、皇帝陛下に祈りを捧げたとか、もっともらしい言葉を並べることもできますが…確かに祈ったし、痛みに耐える訓練も受けていました。ですが、どんなアービトレイターにも限界はあります。本当に折れかけたとき、最後に私を支えたのは―憎しみでした」
languages.original_text: "I could throw pretty words at you about how I went through the Injuncta Cardinal in my mind or prayed to the Emperor, but... I did pray, and I was well trained to tolerate pain, but every Arbitrator has their limit. When I was almost broken, what helped me through was hatred."

traits.locale_text: 「頭の中でインユンクタ・カーディナルを唱えたとか、皇帝陛下に祈りを捧げたとか、もっともらしい言葉を並べることもできますが…確かに祈ったし、痛みに耐える訓練も受けていました。ですが、どんなアービトレイターにも限界はあります。本当に折れかけたとき、最後に私を支えたのは―憎しみでした」

languages.text: "Ich könnte Euch jetzt blumig beschreiben, wie ich im Geiste die Injuncta Cardinal durchgegangen bin oder zum Imperator gebetet habe, aber ... Ich habe zwar gebetet und hatte eine gut ausgebildete Schmerztoleranz, aber jeder Arbitrator hat seine Grenzen. Als sie mich fast gebrochen hatten, half mir mein Hass, es durchzustehen."
languages.original_text: "I could throw pretty words at you about how I went through the Injuncta Cardinal in my mind or prayed to the Emperor, but... I did pray, and I was well trained to tolerate pain, but every Arbitrator has their limit. When I was almost broken, what helped me through was hatred."

traits.locale_text: "Ich könnte Euch jetzt blumig beschreiben, wie ich im Geiste die Injuncta Cardinal durchgegangen bin oder zum Imperator gebetet habe, aber ... Ich habe zwar gebetet und hatte eine gut ausgebildete Schmerztoleranz, aber jeder Arbitrator hat seine Grenzen. Als sie mich fast gebrochen hatten, half mir mein Hass, es durchzustehen."

languages.text: « Je pourrais vous abreuver de belles paroles en vous disant que j'ai récité en boucle l'Injuncta Cardinal, ou que j'ai adressé mes prières à l'Empereur, mais... Certes, j'ai prié, et j'étais formé à supporter la torture, mais même le meilleur des arbitrators a ses limites. Quand j'ai été sur le point de renoncer, c'est la haine qui m'a guidé. »
languages.original_text: "I could throw pretty words at you about how I went through the Injuncta Cardinal in my mind or prayed to the Emperor, but... I did pray, and I was well trained to tolerate pain, but every Arbitrator has their limit. When I was almost broken, what helped me through was hatred."

traits.locale_text: « Je pourrais vous abreuver de belles paroles en vous disant que j'ai récité en boucle l'Injuncta Cardinal, ou que j'ai adressé mes prières à l'Empereur, mais... Certes, j'ai prié, et j'étais formé à supporter la torture, mais même le meilleur des arbitrators a ses limites. Quand j'ai été sur le point de renoncer, c'est la haine qui m'a guidé. »

languages.text: «Podría contarle una bonita historia sobre cómo recité la Injuncta Cardinal en mi mente o recé al Emperador, pero... sí que hubo plegarias, y me habían entrenado para aguantar el dolor, pero todo Arbitrator tiene sus límites. Cuando ya estaban a punto de doblegarme, lo único que me ayudó a resistir fue el odio».
languages.original_text: "I could throw pretty words at you about how I went through the Injuncta Cardinal in my mind or prayed to the Emperor, but... I did pray, and I was well trained to tolerate pain, but every Arbitrator has their limit. When I was almost broken, what helped me through was hatred."

traits.locale_text: «Podría contarle una bonita historia sobre cómo recité la Injuncta Cardinal en mi mente o recé al Emperador, pero... sí que hubo plegarias, y me habían entrenado para aguantar el dolor, pero todo Arbitrator tiene sus límites. Cuando ya estaban a punto de doblegarme, lo único que me ayudó a resistir fue el odio».

languages.text: “我可以说些漂亮话，说我当时脑子里是如何一遍遍重复着红衣主教的布道，或是如何向帝皇祈祷的，虽然……我确实向祂祈祷了。我接受过很多忍耐痛苦的训练，但每位法务官都是有极限的。当我快要崩溃的时候，是仇恨的力量让我熬了过来。”
languages.original_text: "I could throw pretty words at you about how I went through the Injuncta Cardinal in my mind or prayed to the Emperor, but... I did pray, and I was well trained to tolerate pain, but every Arbitrator has their limit. When I was almost broken, what helped me through was hatred."

traits.locale_text: “我可以说些漂亮话，说我当时脑子里是如何一遍遍重复着红衣主教的布道，或是如何向帝皇祈祷的，虽然……我确实向祂祈祷了。我接受过很多忍耐痛苦的训练，但每位法务官都是有极限的。当我快要崩溃的时候，是仇恨的力量让我熬了过来。”

languages.text: "Zihnimden Esas Buyrukların geçtiğini söyleyip İmparator'a nasıl yakarışlarda bulunduğumu süslü süslü anlatabilirim ancak... Elimden gelen tek şey dua etmekti. Aldığım eğitim sayesinde acıya dayanıklılığım yüksektir fakat her Yargıcı'nın bir sınırı vardır. Gücümü neredeyse yitirdiğimde yardımıma koşan, hissettiğim nefret oldu."
languages.original_text: "I could throw pretty words at you about how I went through the Injuncta Cardinal in my mind or prayed to the Emperor, but... I did pray, and I was well trained to tolerate pain, but every Arbitrator has their limit. When I was almost broken, what helped me through was hatred."

Aldığım eğitim sayesinde acıya dayanıklılığım yüksektir fakat her Yargıcı'nın bir sınırı vardır. Gücümü neredeyse yitirdiğimde yardımıma koşan hissettiğim nefret oldu."

I did pray, and I was well trained to tolerate pain, but every Arbitrator has their limit. When I was almost broken, what helped me through was hatred."
